name: AdvanceCarePlanningCPT
title: Advance Care Planning (CPT)
description: This value set contains CPT concepts for advance care planning.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains CPT concepts for advance care planning.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people having participated in advance care planning.  This element may map to the "Encounter" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes billing codes for the initial period of time for which services can be billed.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes billing codes for additional period of time for which services can be billed.)

concept.display: Advance care planning including the explanation and discussion of advance directives such as standard forms (with completion of such forms, when performed), by the physician or other qualified health care professional; first 30 minutes, face-to-face with the patient, family member(s), and/or surrogate

contains.display: Advance care planning including the explanation and discussion of advance directives such as standard forms (with completion of such forms, when performed), by the physician or other qualified health care professional; first 30 minutes, face-to-face with the patient, family member(s), and/or surrogate
